record.description: Lincoln's favorite portrait painted just before he left Springfield for Washington is featured as one of the 50th Anniversary exhibits in the University of Chicago's Lincoln Room. Standing on either side of the portrait is a university Citizen's Board member and Sybil Ferriter, a student guide.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Archives, date rec'vd stamps, difficult to read caption. Paint and marker on surface for cropping instructions?
